product_highlights: Global network of testing and auditing services
Comprehensive cosmetics auditing integrated with testing
Regulatory compliance audits for multiple markets
Quality assurance and supplier auditing programs
notes: Eurofins offers comprehensive testing and auditing services for the cosmetics industry through their global network of laboratories. They provide regulatory compliance audits, quality assurance programs, and supplier auditing integrated with their extensive product testing capabilities. Eurofins serves manufacturers seeking end-to-end quality and compliance solutions.
